attributes.action: legalise the use of the Dignitas clinic in Switzerland for those in severe pain or suffering from terminal illnesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgraceful that a person can't choose the manner of there death if they are suffering from terminal illness or hugely limiting disability. I believe that changes in the law should be made to permit people to access this clinic without any condemnation and prosecution of themselves or their families for assited scuicide as every human deserves the right to a dignified death rather than a slow, painful and often undignified death and hopefuly in the future something similar may be introduced into Britain to save the expense and exhaustion of travel.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
